ResearchProjectDef.label: stew cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Stew is a form of a very nourishing meal, cooked in bulk over fire. This research also gives access to the wood-fired pot necessary to cook stews.

rulesStrings.li: subject_story->embraced the tradition of stew cooking, bringing together community and cuisine over the warmth of a shared pot
subject_story->cultivated techniques to craft stews that are not only nourishing but carry the flavors of cultural heritage and togetherness
subject_story->introduced the wood-fired pot, an essential tool for preparing these hearty meals in the traditional way
subject_gerund->nurturing bodies and souls with the communal art of stew making
